message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you coming down to $120, but I'm really only looking to spend $90 at this time. Would you be willing to meet me halfway there?
I understand you're looking to spend $90, but I'm not sure I can go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer you the product for $110.
Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still looking to save a bit more. How about we settle on $95? That would be a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $97.50, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
